com.marshalchen.common.commonUtils.fileUtils

类 PreferencesUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marshalchen.common.commonUtils.fileUtils.PreferencesUtils

  • public class PreferencesUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    PreferencesUtils, easy to get or put data
      Preference Name
    • you can change preference name by PREFERENCE_NAME
      Put Value
    • put string putString(android.content.Context, String, String)
    • put int putInt(android.content.Context, String, int)
    • put long putLong(android.content.Context, String, long)
    • put float putFloat(android.content.Context, String, float)
    • put boolean putBoolean(android.content.Context, String, boolean)
      Get Value
    • get string getString(android.content.Context, String), getString(android.content.Context, String, String)
    • get int getInt(android.content.Context, String), getInt(android.content.Context, String, int)
    • get long getLong(android.content.Context, String), getLong(android.content.Context, String, long)
    • get float getFloat(android.content.Context, String), getFloat(android.content.Context, String, float)
    • get boolean getBoolean(android.content.Context, String), getBoolean(android.content.Context, String, boolean)

      • putString

        public static boolean putString(android.content.Context context,
                java.lang.String key,
                java.lang.String value)
        put string preferences
        参数:
        context -
        key - The name of the preference to modify
        value - The new value for the preference
        返回:
        True if the new values were successfully written to persistent storage.

      • putString

        public static boolean putString(android.content.Context context,
                java.lang.String preferenceName,
                java.lang.String key,

      • getString

        public static java.lang.String getString(android.content.Context context,
                         java.lang.String key)
        get string preferences
        参数:
        context -
        key - The name of the preference to retrieve
        返回:
        The preference value if it exists, or null. Throws ClassCastException if there is a preference with this name that is not a string
        另请参阅:
        getString(android.content.Context, String, String)

      • getString

        public static java.lang.String getString(android.content.Context context,
                         java.lang.String key,
                         java.lang.String defaultValue)
        get string preferences
        参数:
        context -
        key - The name of the preference to retrieve
        defaultValue - Value to return if this preference does not exist
        返回:
        The preference value if it exists, or defValue. Throws ClassCastException if there is a preference with this name that is not a string

        key - The name of the preference to retrieve
        返回:

        public static boolean getBoolean(android.content.Context context,
                 java.lang.String key)
        get boolean preferences, default is false
        参数:
        context -
        key - The name of the preference to retrieve
        返回:
        The preference value if it exists, or false. Throws ClassCastException if there is a preference with this name that is not a boolean
        另请参阅:
        getBoolean(android.content.Context, String, boolean)
